about_the_game:
The Slime Races is the ultimate Twitch-integrated meme game where your viewers can join the fun by predicting which slime will win the race! Watch the slimes wobble and squish their way to the finish line in this completely automated showdown.

With full Twitch integration, The Slime Races automatically handles the entire prediction, allowing your viewers to bet their channel points on their slime of choice. Every race is packed with chaotic excitement and unpredictable outcomes, making it a perfect stream filler or community event.

IMPORTANT: To be able to run Twitch Predictions you need to either be Twitch Affiliate or Partner as the game uses the Channel Points system. However, casual play mode is available! A Twitch account isn't required for play.

Key Features:

  • Twitch Prediction integration—Start the prediction and entire race with a single button in-game.

  • Simple, fun, and completely automated—perfect for hands-off entertainment.

  • Slime Nicknames—Work with your audience to rename the Slimes.

  • Casual Play Mode—Start a race without the need to connect to Twitch

Get ready to cheer on your favorite slime, and may the squishiest slime win!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 (64-bit), Windows® 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4670 (quad-core) / AMD® FX-Series™ FX-4350 (quad-core)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1080 (8 GB) / AMD® Radeon™ RX-460 (4 GB) / Intel® Arc™ A380 (6 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires Twitch Affiliate or Partner account for Twitch Integration. Twitch account NOT required for casual play
